name: Yozakura Wizard VR
description:
Yozakura Wizard is a Japanese style VR stealth action game based on Onmouji.

Far past in Japan, the whole land was dominated by demons and spirits. And the only person that can save this land is YOU!!!
Use Onmyodo to seal the demons and spirits, and change them into weapons by using the power of “wizard”.
And become legendary “Yozakura Wizard”!

Use the sword, bow, amulet, and etc. to defeat the demons. You could also use the various stealth and get into demons’ territory to sneak attack!Of Course, Battle Actions Are Full With Reality!!By using beautiful graphics, you will see the marvelous world of Japan from 360 degrees!!characteristic
  • Kyoto based beautiful Japanese-style stage.
  • Use the amulet for the basic attack!
  • Use magic and weapons for various battle actions!
  • Surprise attack your enemy and make the world move in slow motion by "Yozakura Mode"!
  • Seal the demons and get the weapons
